sentence.Network_en: The hatpin projected from the back of her head like a trolley rod.
sentence.Network_cn: 扣幅的饰针从脑后向上翘起,象根电车的辫子.

sentence.Network_en: You can find the hatpin on the floor of the Library.
sentence.Network_cn: 哦,要穿过Thanatos之门,你需要一个别针解锁.

sentence.Network_en: I have the hatpin yet at home.
sentence.Network_cn: 这支针至今我还保藏在家里.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(62) ... hatless 不戴帽子的 hatpin 帽针 hatrack 帽架.
hatpin , of base metal , whether or not plated with precious metal., 女帽饰针 , 贱金属制 , 不论是否镀有贵金属.

entry.tran: （用以把女帽别在头发上的）帽针
entry.def: A hatpin is a metal pin which can be pushed through a woman's hat and through her hair to keep the hat in position.

means.word_mean: 1. a long sturdy pin used by women to secure a hat to their hair

auth_sentence.content: Our mothers...could have recourse to a hatpin if attacked.
auth_sentence.res_content: Our mothers...could have recourse to a hatpin if attacked.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Our mothers...could have recourse to a hatpin if attacked.
